titleStmt.title: The swearers chorus to the first Presbyterian plot

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N.T. at the entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Verse - There was a monstrous doctor; this doctor had no peer, a rogue from his cradle, and bred".
Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
